 2018-14302018-11-22,  ,  ,  HC,  , 
ActFood and Drugs Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Food and Drug Regulations (Mica)
PrecisRegulations Amending the FOOD AND DRUG REGULATIONS (MICA) in order to allow mica coated with titanium dioxide and/or iron oxide to be used as a colorant in drugs in solid or liquid dosage forms for oral administration and/or external use.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2018-0248 Publication Date: 2018-12-12
AttachmentsAttachment
